website_summaries.verdict: This digestive supplement is formulated to target digestive problems, and may be beneficial to dogs and cats with compromised digestive systems due to antibiotics.
pros: Soothes tummy issues with 2  strains of prebiotics and 3 strains of probiotics that increase the development of "good" bacteria in the gut
Supports digestive systems of dogs and cats that are taking antibiotics
Some dog owners report improvement in anal gland issues
cons: Some pets, especially cats, refused to eat it
Can cause gas at first, but this symptom usually resolves with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Without literally any good bacteria to function
customer_reviews.text: Did research to learn important ingredients etc. This product won for contents over a handful of others advertised. Also made in USA a big factor, as was its preparation and origin of ingredients. My 12 year old cat had been on antibiotics for over 6 weeks. Without literally any good bacteria to function, his bowels shut down. Along with 2 vet visits for enemas and PROFIVEX, he is back to his active, talkative self! Thanks so much for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, my cats love it (and my dog)
customer_reviews.text: All the animals in the house go crazy when I open the container. I was worried my finicky cat wouldn't eat the food once it was added but he likes it too. It works well too and my Siamese car has not had probli with her anal glands since using it. Other reviews mention seepage from the anal glands, and she did for a few days after use but it stopped. I consider it a fair exchange as she's had to be treated twice for anal glands infection.. one was pretty severe and she had dead skin sloughing off. (Sorry for the gross details..)
customer_reviews.author: Horsefeathers

customer_reviews.title: Help for elderly animals especially w/back leg probs
customer_reviews.text: I started this aide to regulate my 18 y/o chi w/heart & kidney failure, back leg arthritis (amongst other issues). She has been using this product for over a year. B4, she was irregular and would stress over her constipation. I take her meds, crush them, add water w/the Provivex. Now no stress @ medtime as I no longer have to force pills down her throat. I use a syringe to give this mix to her 2X's daily. She is 6lbs, so she takes a half tsp ea time. She BM's daily w/o strain in spite of weak back legs. She is running down the hall now she's so happy she can poop!.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes Profivex!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old cat has chronic diarrhea unless he gets a scoop of Profivex a day. I mix it in his food, and he seems to like the taste. I think this probiotic has added months to this old guy’s life.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Littrell

customer_reviews.title: Bummed it didn’t help.
customer_reviews.text: The first few times when I added this to my dogs food, she ate it right up. But after a few days, she doesn’t seem to care if I add it or don’t. Was hoping it would help her want to eat her food. Bummed it didn’t. My dog has a sensitive stomach and minor anal gland issues. Trying to get her to have a more consistent eating schedule so she will poop on a more regular basis and also to help her not have upset stomach aches.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than the competitor brand with the same great ingredients. My dogs love the taste and it’s really helped with their digestive issues. One thing to note, don’t skip a day! I did on accident and my chihuahua was immediately constipated.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Only way to control bowel problem for cat . Have used product for approximately 2 years. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: james murray

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Bubba was having bouts of colitis and other anal issues. By using this probiotic and food changes he is doing great.
customer_reviews.author: MLEE

customer_reviews.title: cats don't like taste
customer_reviews.text: added it to food and cats stopped eating food. stopped adding product, cats ate their grub again!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Pets won't get near it
customer_reviews.text: Not a single pet in this house will get near it. No go for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kris J.

customer_reviews.title: A must if your dog is going on antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: The dog loved it AND it got us through a 21 day antibiotic trial with no stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzed

customer_reviews.title: Chewy.com is cheaper then the vet for my dogs meds
customer_reviews.text: The price and my vet recommended it because my dog was sick and it helping
customer_reviews.author: nancy viscariello

customer_reviews.title: Keep your dogs belly clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the dogs. Easy to give to them and they gobble it up so must have a good flavor!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: so far she is feeling better and her appetite is better since she started taking
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that has some health issues, so far she is feeling better and her appetite is better since she started taking Profivex
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Marston

customer_reviews.title: It works for her
customer_reviews.text: My dog always has a upset stomach it helps her with that
customer_reviews.author: roy gaston

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product to help both my cats with digestion ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to help both my cats with digestion issues. They both spit up or throw up their food, have diarrhea and constipation. They seem to be doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dog’s tummy!
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago I had a very ill hospice foster dog. The vet that did acupuncture on her gave me this because my foster dog was on some very serious medication. This really helped her tummy. She passed away and I found this again so I give it to all my dogs, especially the ones taking routine medicine or the ones on antibiotics. The love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Working well for foster dog
customer_reviews.text: I foster greyhounds...so usually I get stressed dogs going through a sudden food switch, may or may not be on antibiotics, and have a variety of intestinal parasites that we are treating for. I was given this at a veterinary conference as a sample and tried it on my latest foster. His story is the same (stressed, cold turkey food switch, hookworms, and on cephalexin from a surgery.) When I took him out to a meet and greet with some families wanting to adopt him my foster coordinator was impressed that he is having solid stools and wanted to know my secret. Will be putting all of my future foster dogs on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: My boys thought it was a treat!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened it my dogs thought this was a treat. My small dogs are fussy with food and I have tried other probiotics, but they never really liked the taste. They love this one! I just sprinkle it on their food and they eat it right up. Even the cat started getting in on the act, so now I sprinkle it on his food, too.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: my dog and cat loved this works great i love that it keeps their ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog and cat loved this works great i love that it keeps their digestive tract healthy and they love it and my cat is very picky so that makes it even better would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Leaf__Ninja

product_meta.title: VETNIQUE LABS Profivex Probiotics for Dogs and Cats: Daily Pet Digestive 5 Strain Probiotics Powder with Prebiotics & Added Fiber from Sweet Potato - Pork Liver Flavor
feature_bullets: CLINICAL STRENGTH PROBIOTIC with FIVE Strains & FIVE Billion CFUs per Scoop! Profivex probiotic supplements for dogs and cats are a premium addition to your pet's food.

EXTREMELY HIGH POTENCY & VIABILITY to yield the highest results in a raw unprocessed form, 100% Guaranteed Results. Dog probiotics like Profivex are a great way to help your pet become healthy and happy.

FORTIFIED WITH 2 PREBIOTICS including FOS & Sweet Potato for added fiber & nutrients. Our cat and dog probiotic powder is perfect for helping pets with diarrhea, constipation and other stomach issues.

VETERINARIAN FORMULATED & RECOMMENDED to support a healthy digestive tract & immune system. Do you want the best for your pets? Then be sure to always choose Vetnique products - Profivex probiotics are great when used in conjuction with glandex soft chews for dogs or other Glandex products.
MADE IN USA WITH PREMIUM INGREDIENTS including great tasting Pork Liver, Great Value lasts 2 months for pets under 40 lbs!
